Mej yuav ua le caag has tau tas mej muaj tswvyim. Vaajtswv yuav teb rua Yauj tej kws mej teb tsi tau.
Yauj has rua mej xwb, tsi yog has rua kuv, tabsis kuv yuav tsi teb le mej.
“Yauj, puab swb lug lawm, puab tsi muaj lug teb koj le.
Thaus puab tsi muaj lug has, txawm yuav ca kuv nyob tuabywv hab los? Puab sawv ntawd los puab tsi muaj lug has le.
Tsi tau, nwgnuav kuv yuavtsum teb hab has tej lug kws kuv xaav rua koj noog.
Kuv yuav rawm has kuv tej lug; kuv ua tsi taug sab ntev lawm.
Yog tsi muaj sijhawm rua kuv has lug, kuv tej lug yuav phwj ib yaam le cov cawv txiv maab tshab kws phwj tawm huv lub naab tuaj.
Kuv yuavtsum has kuv lub sab txhaj nqeg.
Qhov kws kuv caav nuav tsi yog kuv yuav xaav tuaj leejtwg tog, lossis tsi yog kuv qhuas ib tug twg.
Kuv tsi laam ua txuj qhuas ib tug twg, yog kuv ua le ntawd, Vaajtswv yuav rau txim rua kuv.
“Yauj, koj ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws kuv yuav has rua koj.
Kuv yuav has tej kws kuv tub xaav tseg lawd rua koj noog.
Tej lug kws kuv has yog lug ntawm lub sab pheejxeeb hab kuv has tej lug tseeb xwb.
Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig tsim kuv hab pub txujsa rua kuv.
“Yog koj teb tau, ca le teb kuv tej lug hab npaaj nrug kuv sis caav.
Koj hab kuv zoo ib yaam nkaus taabmeeg Vaajtswv wb ob leeg puavleej yog muab aav puab.
Yog le ntawd, tsi taag koj yuav ntshai kuv; kuv yuav tsi has nyaav rua koj.
“Tej nuav yog tej lug kws kuv nov koj has:
‘Kuv tsi muaj txim; kuv tsi tau ua txhum dlaabtsi. Kuv ncaaj nceeg hab tsi muaj txim.
Tabsis yog Vaajtswv nrhav lug tawmtsaam kuv, hab ua rua kuv ib yaam le ua rua tug yeebncuab.
Vaajtswv muab saw hlau khi kuv kutaw; nwg saib ntsoov kuv rhais txhua kaujruam.’
“Yauj, ca kuv qha koj, koj yeej ua tsi yog lawm. Vaajtswv muaj fwjchim luj dlua tuabneeg.
Ua le caag koj lam has tas Vaajtswv tsi teb tuabneeg tej lug ywg?
Txawm yog Vaajtswv has taag has thab los tsi muaj leejtwg quavntsej nwg tej lug le.
Thaus tsaus ntuj kws tuabneeg pw tsaug zug, Vaajtswv has rua tuabneeg huv nruab npau suav hab ua rua tuabneeg ua ywgtoog pum.
Vaajtswv ua kuas tuabneeg noog Vaajtswv tej lug hab kuas puab fwm Vaajtswv tej lug ntuag.
Vaajtswv has kuas tuabneeg tso puab tej kev txhum tseg hab cawm puab dlim ntawm txujkev kws ua tuabneeg khaavtheeb.
Vaajtswv tsi xaav kuas tuabneeg raug kev puamtsuaj; Vaajtswv cawm kuas tuabneeg dlim ntawm txujkev tuag.
Vaajtswv ntuag tuabneeg lug ntawm tej kaab mob kev nkeeg kws ua rua nwg lub cev mob lwj ntsuav.
Tug tuabneeg muaj mob, nwg yeej tsi qaab lus, txawm yog zaub mov qaab npaum twg los nwg dlhuav kawg le.
Nwg lub cev ntxaug zuj zug tsi tshuav dlaabtsi le; pum nwg tej pobtxhaa nyob zoj;
nwg tub yuav moog rua huv tubtuag teb.
“Tej zag kuj muaj ib tug timtswv lug paab nwg, yog ib tug ntawm Vaajtswv ib txheeb tug timtswv kws lug qha kuas tuabneeg paub txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Vim txujkev hlub, tug timtswv ntawd has tas, ‘Ca le tso nwg! Nwg tsi yog tug kws yuav moog rua huv tubtuag teb. Ntawm nuav yog qhov kws txhwv nwg.’
Nwg lub cev yuav rov puv mog nyoos hab muaj zug tuaj;
thaus nwg thov, Vaajtswv yuav teb nwg tej lug; nwg yuav pehawm Vaajtswv ntawm lub sab xyivfaab hlo; Vaajtswv yuav pauj tej kws nwg ua ncaaj ua nceeg rov rua nwg.
Nwg yuav has taabmeeg rua suavdlawg tas, ‘Kuv tau ua txhum lawm tag. Kuv yeej ua tsi ncaaj, tabsis yog Vaajtswv tshwj kuv xwb.
Vaajtswv tsi ca kuv moog rua huv tubtuag teb, kuv txhaj tseem muaj sa nyob.’
“Vaajtswv ua txhua yaam nuav, nwg ua taag los ua thab;
Vaajtswv cawm tuabneeg txujsa hab pub kuas tuabneeg muaj kev kaaj sab.
“Yauj, nwgnuav koj ca le noog kuv tej lug, hab koj nyob tuabywv ca kuv has.
Tabsis yog koj muaj dlaabtsi yuav has, ca le has rua kuv; yog koj has yog lawm, kuv txaus sab yuav le koj has.
Tabsis yog koj has tsi yog, ces koj nyob tuabywv noog kuv has, hab kuv yuav qha kuas koj ua tau tuabneeg ntse.”
Elihus has ntxiv tas, Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg txawj ntse, nwgnuav mej ca le noog tej lug kws kuv yuav has.
Thaus mej noj, mej txhaj paub has tas zaub mov qaab. Tabsis thaus mej nov luas tej lug, mej tsua tsi ntse.
Ca peb xaiv saib qhov twg yog qhov zoo; ca peb txav txim sab saib qhov twg yog qhov yog.
Yauj khaav has tas nwg tsi muaj txim txhum dlaabtsi, tsuas yog Vaajtswv tsi leeg has tas Yauj yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg xwb.
Yauj nug has tas, “Kuv yuav ua le caag dlaag has tas kuv ua txhum? Kuv muaj mob khu tsi tau, tabsis tsi yog vim kuv ua txhum.”
Mej puas tau pum dlua ib tug tuabneeg zoo le Yauj? Nwg yeej tsi fwm Vaajtswv le.
Nwg nyam ua phoojywg nrug cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas hab moog koom nrug cov tuabneeg txhum xwb.
Nwg has tas qhov kws ua lawv le Vaajtswv sab nyam tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi le.
Mej cov kws yog tuabneeg paub taab, mej ca le noog kuv has! Tug Vaajtswv kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus puas ua txhum?
Nwg yuav muab nqe zug rua tuabneeg lawv le tej num kws puab ua, hab ua zoo rua puab kuas tsimnyog qhov kws puab ua.
Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus yeej tsi ua txhum nwg ibtxwm ua ncaaj rua suavdlawg.
Puas muaj leejtwg muab fwjchim rua Vaajtswv? Puas muaj leejtwg tsaa Vaajtswv kaav lub nplajteb?
Yog Vaajtswv rhu tuabneeg txujsa lawm,
ces txhua tug kws muaj sa yuav tuag rov moog ua aav dlua.
Yog mej has tas mej yog tuabneeg ntse, nwgnuav mej ca le noog kuv has.
Mej tseem yuav rau txim rua Vaajtswv tug kws ncaaj nceeg hab los? Mej xaav has tas Vaajtswv ntxub kev ncaaj nceeg nua los?
Vaajtswv rau txim rua cov vaajntxwv hab cov numtswv thaus puab ua phem ua qas lossis ua tsi ncaaj.
Vaajtswv tsi tuaj cov numtswv tog, lossis tsi saib cov npluanuj tseemceeb dlua cov pluag. Rua qhov txhua tug puavleej yog Vaajtswv tsim.
Mo ntuj tej tuabneeg ca le tuag tuabywv lawm. Vaajtswv ua tau kuas tuabneeg tuag hab puamtsuaj moog; tej tuabneeg muaj zug los Vaajtswv ua kuas tuag yoojyim heev.
Vaajtswv saib ntsoov txhua tug tuabneeg rhais ruj moog kev.
Tsi muaj ib qhov tsaus ntuj kws thaiv tau Vaajtswv tsi pum tug tuabneeg txhum le.
Vaajtswv tsi tau teem ib lub sijhawm rua tuabneeg moog rua Vaajtswv txav txim.
Vaajtswv muab ib cov thawjcoj rhu hab muab ib cov lug hloov, tsi taag yuav taug puab lub neej le.
Rua qhov Vaajtswv yeej paub tej kws puab ua huv tuabsi lawm; thaus tsaus ntuj nwg muab puab ntsawm hab tsuj ntag tseg.
Vaajtswv rau txim rua tuabneeg txhum rua suavdlawg saib ntsoov,
Rua qhov puab tso nwg tseg hab tsi quavntsej nwg tej lug saamfwm.
Puab quab yuam tej tuabneeg pluag, ua rua cov tuabneeg pluag lub suab quaj moog txug Vaajtswv hab Vaajtswv nov puab lub suab quaj thov paab.

Yog Vaajtswv txav txim sab tsi ua ib yaam dlaabtsi los yeej tsi muaj leejtwg thuam tau nwg le. Yog Vaajtswv tsiv nkaum lawm, yeej tsi muaj leejtwg nrhav tau, tsi has ib tug twg lossis ib tsaav tuabneeg twg le.
Ntau tsaav tuabneeg ua tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi rua cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas kuas cov tuabneeg fwm Vaajtswv tsi xob tswjfwm puab.
Yauj, koj puas leeg koj tej kev txhum rua Vaajtswv, hab coglug has tas koj yuav tsi ua ntxiv lawm?
Koj puas tau thov Vaajtswv qha koj tej kev txhum rua koj, hab koj puas txaus sab tso koj tej kev phem kev qas tseg?
Rua qhov koj tsi leeg paub tej kws Vaajtswv ua, koj yuav ua le caag kuas Vaajtswv ua lawv le koj xaav tau? Koj yog tug txav txim sab, tsi yog kuv; ca le qha tej kws koj xaav rua kuv.
Tug tuabneeg kws thoob tsib to nrog yeej noog kuv has, tug tuabneeg muaj tswvyim kws nov kuv has yuav has tas,
tej lug kws Yauj has tsi yog lug txawj ntse, hab tej kws nwg has tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi.
Mej ua tuab zoo noog tej kws Yauj has, mej yuav pum has tas, nwg has le tug tuabneeg sab phem has.
Yauj ntxeev sab tsub ntxiv rua nwg tej kev txhum; nwg ua saib tsi taug Vaajtswv taabmeeg peb.
Elihus has ntxiv tas, “Koj has tas koj tsi tau ua txhum taabmeeg Vaajtswv, koj has le ntawd tsi yog lawm,
lossis nug Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Kuv tej kev txhum ua le caag rua koj? Yog kuv tsi ua txhum, kuv tsua tau dlaabtsi?’
Kuv yuav teb koj hab koj cov phoojywg tej lug huv tuabsi.
“Ca le saib sau nruab ntug! Saib tej fuab nyob sab npaum le caag!
Txawm yog koj ua txhum los yeej tsi mob Vaajtswv le. Yog koj ua txhum ntau zag, puas ua le caag rua Vaajtswv.
Yog koj ua ncaaj nceeg, puas paab tau Vaajtswv dlaabtsi? Tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi kws Vaajtswv xaav tau ntawm koj le.
Koj tej kev txhum yuav raug tug kws zoo le koj, hab koj txujkev ua zoo paab tau nwg.
“Thaus tuabneeg raug tsimtxom puab quaj ntsuag; puab quaj thov kuas lwm tug cawm puab.
Tabsis puab tsi moog cuag Vaajtswv tug kws tsim puab, tug kws pub puab muaj kev ca sab thaus puab raug kev tsaus ntuj.
Puab tsi moog cuag Vaajtswv tug kws pub kev txawj ntse rua puab, kuas ntse tshaaj tej tsaj hab tej noog.
Puab quaj thov kev paab, tabsis Vaajtswv tsi teb, rua qhov puab sab phem hab khaavtheeb heev.
Qhov kws puab quaj tsi muaj qaabhau; Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus tsi pum lossis tsi nov le.
“Yauj, koj has tas, koj tsi pum Vaajtswv; tabsis koj ua sab ntev tog, koj rooj plaub yeej nyob ntawm Vaajtswv lawm.
Koj xaav has tas Vaajtswv yuav tsi rau txim rua tuabneeg hab nwg tsi quavntsej tuabneeg tej kev txhum nua los?
Txawm yog koj has lug ntau los tsi muaj qaabhau; rua qhov koj tsi paub has tas koj has dlaabtsi.”
Elihus has ntxiv tas, “Koj ua sab ntev noog kuv has, tej lug nuav yog kuv sawv cev Vaajtswv has rua koj.
Kuv muaj kev txawj ntse heev; kuv yuav qha koj lawv le kuv paub has tas Vaajtswv tug kws tsim kuv yog tug ncaaj nceeg.
Tej lug kws kuv has rua koj tsi yog lug cuav; tug kws nyob ntawm koj hauv ntej nuav yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj hab ntse heev.
“Vaajtswv yog tug muaj zug luj zug nchaav! Nwg tsi xaiv leejtwg ntsejmuag; tsi muaj ib yaam kws Vaajtswv tsi paub le.
Vaajtswv tsi pub tug tuabneeg txhum ua neej nyob, tabsis nwg ua ncaaj rua tug tuabneeg txomnyem.
Vaajtswv tsomkwm cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg; nwg ca puab kaav lwm tug ib yaam le tej vaajntxwv, hab ca luas fwm puab moog ibtxhis.
Tabsis qhov kws puab raug luas cuab luas khi, hab raug txomnyem yog vim tej kws puab ua.
Vaajtswv txhaj qha puab tej kev txhum hab puab tej kev khaavtheeb rua puab.
Vaajtswv ua rua puab noog Vaajtswv tej lug ntuag, hab tso puab tej kev phem kev qas tseg.
Yog puab noog Vaajtswv lug hab pehawm nwg, puab lub neej yuav vaammeej hab nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tabsis yog puab tsi noog Vaajtswv lug, puab yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag vim puab tsi quavntsej Vaajtswv.
“Cov tuabneeg kws tsi fwm Vaajtswv, puab tsuas npautawg taag moog le xwb, txawm yog thaus puab raug txim los puab tsi thov Vaajtswv le.
Puab tuag taag rua thaus puab tseem hluas, puab lub neej puamtsuaj taag txaajmuag ntsuav.
Tabsis Vaajtswv ca kev txomnyem lug qha tuabneeg ua neej hab siv txujkev ntxhuv sab lug qheb tuabneeg lub qhovmuag.
“Vaajtswv tso koj dlim kev nyuaj sab, hab pub kuas koj nyob tso sab lug; sau koj lub rooj muaj zaub mov nplua mag.
Tabsis nwgnuav tsimnyog koj raug txim lawv le tej kws koj ua.
Ceevfaaj tsi xob ca luas tej nyaj xab ntxag tau koj; lossis tsi xob ca kev npluanuj coj tau koj moog yuam kev.
Tej nyaj xab ntawd yuav tsi paab koj thaus koj thov kuv paab; txawm yog koj siv taagnrho koj tug zug los paab tsi tau koj dlim.
Tsi xob tog has tas muaj ib mos, txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
Ceevfaaj tsi xob raus teg rua kev ua phem ua qas; qhov kws koj raug txomnyem yog ua kuas koj tso kev txhum tseg.
“Ncu ntsoov has tas Vaajtswv yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus; nwg yog tug xwbfwb kws zoo tshaaj tej xwbfwb huv tuabsi.
Tsi muaj leejtwg has kuas Vaajtswv ua le nuav le u; lossis lam has tas Vaajtswv ua txhum.
Luas ibtxwm qhuas tej kws Vaajtswv ua; koj los yuavtsum qhuas nwg hab.
Txhua tug puavleej pum tej kws Vaajtswv ua lawm; tabsis peb tsuas tuaj dleb saib xwb.
Peb tsi paub Vaajtswv lub fwjchim, lossis tsi paub has tas Vaajtswv nyob thaus twg lug lawm.
“Vaajtswv yog tug nqaa tej dlej huv nplajteb nuav moog hab tso naag lug rua lub nplajteb.
Vaajtswv tso naag huv tej tauv fuab lug rua tuabneeg nplajteb.
Tsi muaj leejtwg paub has tas yog le caag fuab txhaj txawj txaav, lossis yog le caag xub txhaj nroo sau ntuj qhov chaw kws Vaajtswv nyob tuaj.
Vaajtswv ua kuas muaj tsaglig xub laim thoob ntuj, tabsis huv qaab thu havtxwv tseem tsaus ntuj nti.
Qhov ntawd qha has tas, Vaajtswv pub txhua tsaav tuabneeg muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag.
Vaajtswv sau zog tej tsaglig xub rua huv nwg xibteg hab tso tej tsaglig xub ntawd moog raug qhov chaw kws nwg kom tseg.
Thaus xub nroo yog ceebtoom has tas, yuav lug naag xub naag cua, txawm yog tej tsaj los tub paub has tas naag xub naag cua yuav lug.
“Naag xub naag cua ua rua kuv lub sab tshee nyo.
Mej txhua tug ca le noog Vaajtswv lub suab, yog lub suab xub nroo kws tawm ntawm nwg lub qhovncauj tuaj.
Vaajtswv ua tsaglig xub laim ci thoob plawg sau nruab ntug, saab ntuj tim nuav moog ti nkaus saab ntuj tim u.
Ces nov nwg lub suab nrov nroo ntwg tuaj, yog lub suab xub nroo kws txaus ntshai, thaus kws muaj tsaglig xub laim tuaj.
Vaajtswv ua kuas muaj tej txujci tseemceeb tshwm hab muaj ntau yaam kws peb xaav tsi thoob le.
Vaajtswv tso dlaus, tso naag tshauv hab tuamtsaam naag lug rua lub nplajteb.
Txhua tug kws Vaajtswv tsim yuav paub Vaajtswv teg num; Vaajtswv tsi pub tuabneeg ua tau teg num kws Vaajtswv ua.
Tej tsaj qus nkaag moog nkaum rua huv puab tej qhov.
Cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj saab qaabteb tuaj, hab cov cua kws txag heev ntsawj saab qaumteb tuaj.
Vaajtswv tshuab paa ua rua dlej nkoog taag, hab muab dlej hloov ua kuas khov ua tej thooj.
Tsaglig xub laim ci nplaag huv tej tauv fuab tuaj,
tej fuab ntawd txaav moog lawv le Vaajtswv sab nyam. Tej fuab ntawd ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm thoob plawg qaab ntuj.
Vaajtswv tso naag lug ywg lub nplajteb, tej zag yog Vaajtswv tso lug rau txim, lossis tso lug qha kuas tuabneeg paub nwg txujkev hlub.
“Yauj, koj su ib plag hab ua tuab zoo noog; ua tuab zoo saib tej txujci tseemceeb kws Vaajtswv ua.
Koj puas paub has tas Vaajtswv yog tug saamfwm hab ua kuas muaj tsaglig xub laim huv tej tauv fuab tuaj?
Koj puas paub has tas ua le caag tej fuab txhaj nyob tau ntaa yeeg sau nruab ntug, tsi yog Vaajtswv tej txujci kws tseemceeb hab xaav tsi thoob los?
Koj tsuas paub tiv cua kub txomnyem ntsuav thaus cua ntsawj saab qaabteb tuaj rua thaaj aav.
Koj puas paab tau Vaajtswv nthuav lub ntuj, hab ua kuas lub ntuj ntawd tawv le tooj hab dlu le av?
Koj qha rua peb saib yuav has le caag rua Vaajtswv; peb tsi muaj tswvyim, hab tsi paub has.
Kuv yuav tsi nrug Vaajtswv has; vim le caag kuv yuav ca nwg rhuav kuv?
“Thaus cua ntsawj lub ntuj kaaj huv si, lub nub kws nyob sau nruab ntug ci heev tsi muaj leejtwg saib taug.
Muaj ib qhov ci ntsaa ab saab qaumteb tuaj, hab Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab tuaj ua rua peb ntshai kawg le.
Vaajtswv lub fwjchim luj luj heev ua rua peb txaav tsi tau ze nwg; Vaajtswv yeej ua ncaaj ua nceeg thaus nwg txav txim rua tuabneeg.
Tub yog vim le ntawd, tuabneeg txhaj fwm nwg hab nwg tsi quavntsej cov tuabneeg kws khaav has tas puab ntse.”
Tug TSWV teb Yauj huv nthwv cua dlaaj cua dlub tuaj. Tug TSWV has tas,
“Koj yog leejtwg, koj txhaj tuaj nug kuv lub tswvyim, koj tej lug tsi muaj hauvpaug hauvntsis le los sav?
Nwgnuav koj ca le sawv khov kho ib yaam le tug txivneej yawg hab ca le teb tej lug kws kuv yuav nug koj.
Thaus kuv tsim lub nplajteb koj puas nyob ntawd? Yog koj paub txhij paub txhua ca le qha rua kuv saib.
Leejtwg yog tug kws has tas, yuav tsim lub nplajteb luj le caag? Leejtwg yog tug muab hlua ntsuag lub nplajteb? Koj paub tej nuav huv tuabsi los?
Yaam dlaabtsi tuav tej ncej kws txheem lub nplajteb nuav kuas khov? Leejtwg yog tug txhus tug ncej zeb kws txheem lub nplajteb?
Nub ntawd thaus kaaj ntug txoog, tej nubqub hu nkauj ua ke, hab tej timtswv sau ntuj qw zoo sab.
“Leejtwg yog tug kws kaw rooj qho havtxwv thaus havtxwv phwj yog huv nruab tivtxwv tuaj?
Kuv yog tug kws ua kuas fuab laum nkaus havtxwv hab ua kuas qhov tsaus ntuj qhwv nkaus dlej havtxwv.
Kuv tu kuas muaj nrim dlej nrim aav rua havtxwv nyob, hab muaj ntsa laag lub rooj qho tsi pub dlej tawm.
Kuv has rua dlej has tas, ‘Kuv tsuas pub koj puv txug nuav xwb, tsi pub puv dlhau! Koj tug zug kws ndlaas tuaj, tsuas pub ndlaas txug nuav xwb.’
“Yauj, txij thaus koj xeevxwm ua neej lug txug nwgnuav, koj puas tau has kuas lub nub tawm tuaj?
Thaus sawv ntxuv, koj puas tau has kuas tshaav ntuj ci tuaj zab nplajteb, hab cu kuas cov tuabneeg sab phem tawm huv tej chaw kws puab nkaum lug?

Tej dluab tshaav ntuj ntawd ua rua suavdlawg pum tej toj roob hauv peg sawv ntshais ntsho ib yaam le tej ntaub kws luas muab nthuav pum tej nre tais meej nplhav hab pum tseeb le lub yeem homthawj kws luas nas rua aav nplaum.
Nruab nub pum kev ua rua cov tuabneeg sab phem ua tsi tau phem, hab txwv tsi pub puab ua nruj ua tsiv.
“Koj tub moog txug huv qhov kws havtxwv txhawv lawm los? Koj moog tau huv qaab thu havtxwv lug lawm los?
Tub muaj tuabneeg coj koj moog saib lub roojvaag kws quas tubtuag teb kws tsaus ntuj nti lawm los?
Koj puas paub has tas lub nplajteb nuav luj le caag? Yog koj paub, koj ca le qha kuv saib!
“Koj puas paub has tas tug dluab ci yog ci qhov twg tuaj? lossis qhov tsaus ntuj yog lug qhov twg lug?
Koj puas qha tau kuas tej dluab ci hab dluab tsaus ci hab tsaus moog txug txij twg, lossis has kuas rov lug nyob qhov qub?
Kuv xaav has tas koj ua tau, rua qhov koj tub laug heev lawm, hab thaus tsim nplajteb, koj tub nyob ntawd ntaag!
“Koj puas tau moog pum tej txhaab kws kuv ca ntim dlaus hab lawg?
Kuv npaaj tej ntawd ca rua lub sijhawm kws muaj kev txomnyem hab nub kws muaj kev tsuv kev rog.
Koj tub moog txug ntawm qhov chaw kws lub nub tawm tuaj, lossis ntawm qhov chaw kws cov cua saab nubtuaj ntsawj tuaj lawm los?
“Leejtwg yog tug khawb kwj rua naag lug hab qheb kev rua xub nroo?
Leejtwg yog tug tso naag lug rua tej toj roob hauv peg kws tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob?
Leejtwg yog tug ywg dlej rua thaaj aav kws qhuav nkig nkuav kuas tej nroj ntsuag hlub taug?
Leejtwg yog tej naag hab tej lwg txiv?
Leejtwg yog tej dlej nkoog hab tej te nam?
Tej ntawd ua rua dlej khov tawv cuag pobzeb, hab ua rua nplaim havtxwv nkoog khov kho.
“Koj puas yog tug kws muab cov nubqub txhaj Txiv Mim lug teeb ua ib ntsau, lossis muab cov Nubqub Puj Sua Kwv ntaas cais nyag nyob nyag?
Puas yog koj ua rua tej nubqub tig tau moog lug hum lub caij lub nyoog? Lossis qha kev rua tej Nubqub Ntsauv Luj hab Ntsauv Miv?
Koj paub tej kevcai kws luas tswjfwm sau ntuj hab koj muab tau tej kevcai ntawd lug siv rua huv lub nplajteb nua los?
“Koj puas has tau kuas tej fuab tso naag lug rua koj?
Yog koj has kuas tsaglig xub laim, nwg puas tawm tuaj has rua koj tas, ‘Kuv nyob ntawm nuav?’
Leejtwg qha rua tug qab dleg  has tas, tug dlej Niles yuav fuam tuaj, lossis leejtwg qha rua tug lauv qab has tas, naag yuav lug?
Leejtwg muaj kev txawj ntse suav txheeb tej fuab, hab has kuas tej fuab ntawd tso naag lug
rua tej plauv aav kuas nplaum ua tej thooj?
“Koj puas nrhav tau nqaj rua tej tsuv ntxhuav noj, hab ua kuas tej mivnyuas tsuv ntxhuav tsau plaab.
thaus puab nkaum huv qhov tsua lossis pw huv puab tej qhov?
Thaus uab laag tshaib plaab hab yaa rua nuav rua u, leejtwg yog tug pub rua uab laag, hab pub rua uab laag tej mivnyuas kws quaj thov kuv, noj?
“Koj paub thaus twg sai yug mivnyuas? Koj saib ntsoov muaslwj yug mivnyuas los?
Koj puas paub tej tsaj ntawd suab mivnyuas pistsawg hli? Hab thaus twg puab yug mivnyuas?
Koj puas paub thaus twg tej tsaj qus nyob tsawg ndlua yug mivnyuas?
Tej mivnyuas tsaj ntawd luj hlub muaj zug nyob nruab zoo nruab tsuag; puab moog hab tsi rov lug le lawm.
“Leejtwg ca tej neeg luav qus nyob ywj sab? Leejtwg dlaws hlua hab tso puab moog?
Kuv ca taj suabpuam ua tej neeg luav lub chaw nyob, hab ca puab nyob huv lub taj ntsev.
Tej neeg luav ntawd nyam moog nyob dleb tej nroog kuas tsi muaj suab ntshu, kuas tsi muaj leejtwg muab puab cob thauj nraa.
Toj roob hauv peg yog puab tej tshaav zaub; hab yog puab tej chaw ncig nrhav noj.
“Nyuj qus puas hai ntoo rua koj? Nwg puas lug nyob huv koj lub nkuaj ib mos?
Koj puas muab hlua khi tau nwg caab moog laij teb? Lossis koj puas siv tau nwg caab khais haiv koj thaaj teb?
Koj ca sab rua nwg tug zug luj zug nchaav, hab xaav has tas nwg yuav ua koj tej num nyaav nua los?
Koj xaav has tas nwg yuav thauj tej qoob kws koj sau, hab tej nplej huv koj lub tshaav nplej lug tsev nua los?
“Noog ntxhuav ntxuaj tis thawv zoo le yuav yaa taug! Tabsis nwg yaa tsi taug le tug us dlej yaa.
Noog ntxhuav nteg qai rua huv aav hab ca aav ncu kuas dlaug.
Nwg tsi paub txhawj has tas nyob tsaam luas tsuj, lossis nyob tsaam tej tsaj nruab nraag lug muab ua tawg.
Nwg ua ib yaam le tej qai ntawd tsi yog nwg le, nwg tsi mob sab has tas, nyob tsaam nkim nwg tug zug.
Tub yog kuv tsim kuas nwg ruag le ntawd, hab tsi pub nwg muaj tswvyim.
Tabsis thaus twg nwg dlha, nwg luag tug neeg hab tug tuabneeg kws caij neeg plig.
“Yauj, koj puas yog tug kws ua kuas neeg muaj zug hab cog txoob rua neeg?
Puas yog koj ua kuas neeg txawj tuam tau le kooj hab hee ua rua tuabneeg ceeb pis nkaus?
Tej neeg ntawd txauj aav xyivfaab hlo nraag taj; puab dlha tsaus tsi kawg puab tug zug moog rua huv tshaav rog.
Puab tsi paub ntshai dlaabtsi le, hab tsi muaj ib raab ntaaj kws ua rua puab thim rov qaab.
Cov tuabneeg caij neeg, tej cuabyeej ua rog nrov zum zawg hab tej nav ntaaj ci nplaag.
Puab phoom pis yog dlha rua tom hauv ntej; thaus puab nov suab raaj suab xyu nrov puab nyob tsi tswm le.
Thaus puab nov suab raaj suab xyu nrov puab hee quas lawg; thaus tseem moog tsi tau txug huv tshaav rog puab tub nov ntxhab lawm, hab puab noog quas ntsoov cov thawj tubrog lub suab nthe.
“Thaus laj nthuav tis yaa rua nraag qaabteb, puas yog koj qha nwg yaa?
Puas yog dlaav tog koj has nwg, nwg maam moog ua zeg rua sau tej roob sab?
Nwg ua zeg rua sau tej roob tsuas sab, hab ua chaw nkaum rua sau tej nkav zeb.
Nwg nyob rawv zuv saib dleb hab ze, saib puas pum ib tug tsaj nyob qhov twg kws nwg yuav muab tau lug noj.
Cov dlaav ntawd yaa poog ntwg vij tej tsaj tuag, hab tej mivnyuas dlaav zuv rawv haus tej tsaj tuag cov ntshaav.”
Tug TSWV has rua Yauj has tas, “Yauj, koj pheej nrug Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus sis caav? Nwgnuav koj yuav tso tseg lossis tseem yuav caav hab?”
Yauj teb tug TSWV has tas,
“Tug TSWV, kuv yog tuabneeg ruag heev, kuv yuav ua le caag teb tau koj tej lug? Kuv yuav tsi has ib lus ntxiv le lawm.
Kuv tub has tshaaj qhov kws tsimnyog kuv has lawm.”
Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV rov has huv nthwv cua dlaaj cua dlub tuaj rua Yauj ib zag ntxiv.
Tug TSWV has rua Yauj has tas, “Koj ca le sawv khov kho ib yaam le tug txivneej yawg, hab teb kuv tej lug.
Koj has rua kuv tas, kuv ua tsi ncaaj, hab has tas kuv yog tug txhum, koj yog tug tsi txhum nua los?
Koj muaj zug npaum le kuv los? Koj ua tau koj lub suab nrov qeeg nkawg ib yaam le kuv lub los?
Yog koj ua tau, koj ca le sawv khaav txiv ntxhas ib yaam le tug muaj fwjchim, muab koj lub meejmom hab tug tshwjchim lug naav kag saib.
Koj ca le saib tej tuabneeg khaavtheeb; ca le nthe tawg ntho kuas puab txu fwjchim.
Koj ca le saib cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb hab txu puab lub fwjchim kuas qeg; muab cov tuabneeg sab phem tsuj nthi rua ntawm puab qhov chaw.
Muab puab log kag rua nruab aa; muab puab khi kag rua huv tubtuag teb.
Yog koj ua tau, kuv yog thawj tug kws yuav qhuas koj, hab leeg has tas, koj yog tug kws kovyeej lawm.
“Koj ca le saib tug tsaj Npehemaus, kuv tsim nwg hab tsim koj huv tuabsi; nwg noj zaub le tug nyuj,
tabsis yog dlaabtsi ua rua tug tsaj ntawd lub cev muaj zug heev? Hab yog lub fwjchim dlaabtsi ua rua nwg tej nqaj puv nruj nreeg!
Nwg tug kutwv tsaa ntshuas ib yaam le tsob ntoo cab, hab nwg ncej puab ntug ntoob muaj zug heev.
Nwg tej pobtxhaa khov cuag tooj, hab nwg tej teg taw tawv cuag hlau.
“Tug tsaj kws muaj fwvxyeej tshaaj tej tsaj kws kuv tsim; tsuas yog tug TSWV kws tsim nwg txhaj kovyeej nwg xwb.
Nwg noj zaub sau tej roob kws yog tej tsaj nruab nraag tej chaw ncig.
Nwg pw huv qaab tej xyov xuavpaug, hab pw tsau hawv tsawv huv qaab tej lojkov.
Tej ntoo xuavpaug hab tej lwgzaaj kws tuaj rua ntawm ntug dlej ua ntxoov ntxoo rua nwg nkaum.
Nwg tsi ntshai tug dlej kws ndlwg ceev; thaus tug dlej Yauladees ntsawj nwg taubhau los nwg tseem nreg khov kho.
Leejtwg muaj cuabkaav ua rua nwg dligmuag hab nteg tau nwg? Lossis leejtwg muaj cuabkaav muab hlua chaws tau nwg qhovntswg?
“Koj muaj cuabkaav muab nuv ntseg nuv tau Levi-athas lossis muab hlua khi tau nwg tug nplaig los?
Koj puas muab hlua chaws tau nwg qhovntswg? Lossis muab nuv ntseg nqai tau nwg puabtsaig?
Nwg puas yuav thov kuas koj tso nwg moog? Nwg puas yuav ua tuab zoo thov kuas koj hlub nwg?
Nwg puas kaam leeg hab coglug rua koj has tas, nwg yuav ua koj qhev moog ibtxhis?
Koj puas yuav khi tau nwg ib yaam le khi noog rua koj tej ntxhais ua si?
Cov tuabneeg ntaus ntseg puas tuaj kheev nqe yuav nwg? Tej tub laag tub luam puas yuav muab nwg coj moog txhoov muag?
Koj puas yuav muab muv nkaug tau nwg dlaim tawv, lossis muab muv hlau nkaug tau nwg taubhau tshaab?
Yog koj nrug nwg sis ntsuag zug ib zag, koj yuav zeem kag tsi kov ntxiv le lawm;
“Yog leejtwg pum zaaj, nwg yuav ntshai ua ib ce tuag taag hab qaug rua huv aav.
Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog thaab nwg, nwg yuav ua nyaum kawg nkaus, tsi muaj leejtwg tiv tau le.
Leejtwg tawmtsaam nwg taag hab tseem muaj sa nyob? Nyob huv nplajteb nuav yeej tsi muaj leejtwg ua tau le ntawd.
“Ca kuv qha zaaj tej teg taw rua koj paub, hab qha rua koj saib nwg luj hab muaj zug npaum le caag.
Tsi muaj leejtwg laws tau nwg dlaim tawv, lossis nkaug tshaab nwg tej khum.
Leejtwg muaj cuabkaav rua tau nwg lub qhovncauj kws nav zuag plag hab txaus ntshai ntawd?
Nwg lub nrausqaum ua nplai quas reeg ua tej nreej tawv cuag pobzeb.
Nwg tej nplai sis dlhos ntum nti, txawm yog cua los tub txeem tsi tau.
Tej nplai ntawd sis dlhos ua nreej quas reeg, tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi ua tau rua cov nplai ntawd nti le.
Thaus nwg txhub muaj dluab ci laim lab vog, hab nwg ob lub qhovmuag ci le thaus lub nub tawm tuaj.
Muaj nplaim tawg cig laim lag huv nwg qhovncauj hab yaa lab vog tuaj.
Muaj paa nchu tawm huv nwg qhovntswg tuaj, ib yaam le tej paa quavnyaab nchu huv qaab laujkaub.
Nwg tej paa ua tau suavtawg; muaj suavtawg tawm lab vog huv nwg qhovncauj tuaj.
Nwg lub cejdlaab muaj zug heev; txhua tug kws pum nwg ntshai kawg le.
Nwg dlaim tawv tawv cuag hlau txag, tsi muaj ib qhov zooj le.
Nwg sab tawv ib yaam le pobzeb, hab tawv ib yaam le txhib zeb tsi ntshai dlaabtsi le.
Thaus nwg tawm plawg tuaj, txawm yog tej tuabneeg kws muaj zug heev  los yeej ntshai ua ib ce tuag taag tsi paub ua zaaj twg.
Tsi muaj ib raab ntaaj kws yuav txav tau nwg le; txawm yog muab ntaaj, muab muv lossis muab xub vug tua los yeej tsi to le.
Muab muv hlau nkaug, ces ib yaam le muab quavnyaab nkaug hab muab muv tooj nkaug nwg ces ib yaam le muab ntoo lwj nkaug xwb.
Tsi muaj ib xibxub vug yuav ua tau rua nwg tsiv le; muab pobzeb ntaus nwg, ces ib yaam le muab quavnyaab ntaus xwb.
Muab qws ntaus nwg, ces ib yaam le muab ib tug quav nplej ntaus; hab thaus tuabneeg muab muv nkaug nwg, nwg tseem luag hab.
Nwg tej nplai qaab plaab ntse cuag txhais laamfwj; thaus nwg moog, nwg tshav aav tawg pis rhe ib yaam le khais laij lag.
Nwg ua rua havtxwv npau ib yaam le dlej kub npau, hab ua rua havtxwv ua npuag ib yaam le laujkaub roj.
Nwg moog kev mas ua rua dlej txaws dlawb vog rov tom qaab; hab nwg ua rua havtxwv ua npuag dlawb paug.
Tsi muaj ib yaam huv nplajteb nuav yuav pev tau nwg; nwg yog tug tsaj kws tsi paub ntshai dlaabtsi le.
Txawm yog tej tsaj kws ua tau heev los nwg tsi ntshai le; nwg yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav taagnrho txhua yaam tsaj nruab nraag.”
Yauj teb tug TSWV has tas, “Tug TSWV, kuv paub has tas koj yog tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj heev; koj xaav ua dlaabtsi, koj yeej ua tau huv tuabsi.
Koj nug has tas, ua le caag kuv txhaj muaj sab tawv nrug koj sis caav; kuv yog tuabneeg ruag, kuv has txug tej kws kuv tsi totaub, hab tej yaam xaav tsi thoob kws kuv tsi tau paub dlua le xwb.
Koj kuas kuv noog koj has; hab teb koj tej lug.
Yaav taag lug, kuv tsuas paub lawv le luas qha kuv xwb, tabsis nwgnuav kuv qhovmuag pum koj lawm tag.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txaajmuag kawg nkaus rua tej lug kws kuv has, kuv txhaj moog nyob ntawm cub tshau hab huv aav ris sab hlo tsi ua ntxiv le lawm.”

Tom qaab kws tug TSWV has rua Yauj taag lawd, tug TSWV has rua Elifas has tas, “Kuv chim heev rua koj hab koj ob tug phoojywg, rua qhov thaus mej pav txug kuv zaaj, mej has tsi tseeb lawv le Yauj kws yog kuv tug tubkhai has.

Nwgnuav mej ca le moog nteg xyaa tug txiv nyuj hab xyaa tug laug yaaj tuaj rua Yauj tua hlawv fij dlaws mej lub txim. Yauj yuav thov kuv zaam txim rua mej, kuv yuav teb Yauj tej lug thov, hab kuv yuav tsi rau txim rua mej, lawv le mej tau ua txhum lawm. Thaus mej pav txug kuv zaaj, mej tsi has lug tseeb lawv le Yauj has.”
Ces Elifas, Npiledas hab Xaufas txawm ua lawv le tug TSWV has, hab tug TSWV teb Yauj tej lug thov.
Tom qaab Yauj thov Vaajtswv rua nwg peb tug phoojywg taag, tug TSWV tau foom koob moov rua Yauj rov tau zoo neej dlua hab pub Yauj muaj txhua yaam le qub hab ib npaug ntxiv.

Yauj cov kwvtij, cov nkauj muam hab tej phoojywg thaus u tuaj saib Yauj hab nrug Yauj noj haus huv nwg tsev. Puab nplig Yauj sab hab txhawb nwg zug txug tej kev txomnyem kws tug TSWV tso lug rua Yauj. Puab suavdlawg muab nyaj hab ib leeg muab ib nti nplhaib kub rua Yauj.
Tug TSWV foom koob moov rua Yauj lub neej zoo heev dlua thaus chivthawj. Yauj muaj kaum plaub txheeb tug yaaj, rau txheeb tug ntxhuav, ob txheeb tug nyuj hab ib txheeb tug neeg luav.
Yauj muaj xyaa leej tub hab peb leeg ntxhais.
Yauj muab tug ntxhais hlub tis npe hu ua Yemimas, tug ntxhais nraab hu ua Kexiyas, hab tug ntxhais yau hu ua Keles Hapus.
Tej quaspuj kws nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav, tsi muaj ib tug zoo nkauj npaum le Yauj cov ntxhais. Yauj faib nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg rua nwg cov ntxhais ib yaam le faib rua nwg cov tub.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yauj ua neej nyob tau ib puas plaub caug xyoo ntxiv, nwg pum nwg cov tub cov ntxhais tej xeebntxwv huv tuabsi.
Ces thaus Yauj laug heev lawd, nwg maam le tuag.
